name: Save new Thankster addresses to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new address is created in Thankster, Make will automatically add that address to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sOsk6nicDBeYIrwWKVOW1vZPjJoMJzJ-Lv061Q8LuEQ/edit?usp=sharing).
